Name: Celery Gimlet
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of celery stalk (ideally with leaves).
Review: Occupying the ground between the Gimlet and a shrub with pleasing savoury celery notes adding interest.
History: Created in 2010 by Naren Young at Saxon & Parole , in Manhattan, New York City.
Nutrition: One serving of Celery Gimlet contains 149 calories
